resources.string: The 2017 Sydney Morning Herald Good Food Restaurant of the Year, Quay is one of Australia’s most awarded and celebrated restaurants. Set in the heart of Sydney Harbour, Quay has arguably the best views of any restaurant in Australia, with spectacular panoramic views taking in Circular Quay, the Sydney Opera House and the Sydney Harbour Bridge. Captivating the imagination of critics and the dining public alike is Quay’s nature-based menu created by Executive Chef Peter Gilmore.
Lunch Service\nFriday, Saturday and Sunday:\nBookings from 12pm - 1.30pm

Upper Level, Overseas Passenger Terminal, 
The Rocks, Sydney 2000 
Phone: 02 9251 5600
www.quay.com.au
